meanings: (힘·세력 등이) weak, feeble, light; (바람 등이) gentle

meanings.meaning: for shortness(=for short, for brevity's sake)
can't fight[punch] one's way out of a paper bag

vlive.korean: 미안해요, 동호가 약간 컴퓨터 전공 이런 기계 전공에 약해서 - 약해요? Sorry, he's not strong with machines. - Not strong? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] NU'NIVERSITY O.T : 선배들과의 만남
vlive.english: Sorry, he's not strong with machines. - Not strong?

vlive.korean: 그런 건또 맘 약해서 못하는구나? You're too good to do that, right? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 여친있는 선배를 짝사랑할 때 생기는 일_EP01 [라이크]
vlive.english: You're too good to do that, right?

vlive.korean: 그래서 지금 저희 둘만 하니까 약간 에너지가 약해서 빵점이 나오지 않았나~ Since it was just two... I think that's why we lost energy and got 0. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : SINGING ROOM X LADIES' CODE - 코인노래방 X 레이디스 코드
vlive.english: Since it was just two... I think that's why we lost energy and got 0.

vlive.korean: 아니 약해서... But I'm so weak. 듣기 View video BTOB : 끝난줄알았지?🤗
난 비위가 약해서. I have a weak stomach. 듣기 View video iKON : [KONIC TV] 코니들의 본격 VR 체험!!

examples.korean: Weak foundations caused the house to subside. 발음듣기 기초가 약해서 그 집이 내려앉았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Weak foundations caused the house to subside. 발음

examples.korean: She suffered from a weak heart. 발음듣기 그녀는 심장이 약해서 고생했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She suffered from a weak heart. 발음

examples.korean: My legs were so weak I could hardly stand. 발음듣기 나는 다리가 너무 약해서 거의 서 있을 수 없었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: My legs were so weak I could hardly stand. 발음

examples.korean: He finds it hard to refuse as he is tender-hearted. 발음듣기 그는 마음이 약해서 거절을 잘 못한다. 생활 표현 사전
examples.english: He finds it hard to refuse as he is tender-hearted. 발음

examples.korean: His state of weakness prohibits much exercise. 발음듣기 그는 몸이 약해서 운동을 많이 못 한다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His state of weakness prohibits much exercise. 발음
